prompts: Create a shadowy, ghost-type Pokemon with glowing eyes and a misty aura.
I want a small, mischievous Pokemon that can blend into the darkness effortlessly.
Generate an eerie creature that embodies stealth and agility with a cute appearance.
Make a ghostly figure with unique features like a shadowy tail and fiery eyes.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, lurking in the shadows.
Design a Pokemon that has a playful yet mysterious personality and a dark color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that could be found in forests and caves, often playing tricks.
